name: Subscribing Journey
description:
Instructions:
Click the Subscribe button to gain a subscriber.
Click the Gray hand (Luck Hand) to either gain or lose subscribers.
Subbots at random times will give you random subscribers.

Get verified at 100,000.
To complete the game, reach 100 million subscribers.

Note: The Luck Hand when going below 0 subscribers is a bit broken since there is no minus symbol. I will fix this soon.
